text.p: If a system of linear equations has free variables when row-reduced, is it possible for the system to be inconsistent?

font.p: We previously saw a system of 3 linear equations in 2 variables with the following augmented matrix in RREF:

There is no pivot in the column corresponding to [mathjaxinline]x_2[/mathjaxinline]. Thus, there is a free variable. However, the second row indicates that there are no solutions, and the system is inconsistent.
